description:
Little kittens are trapped in a well,
and itâ€™s up to you to figure out how to
get them out of trouble! Slide rows or
columns of cute, cuddly cats to
create chains of three or more cats of
the same kind to pull them out of the
well. The game features both Mission
and Quick Play modes with a
combined 140 levels that will engage
you in hours of fun!
name: Cat Frenzy
